about_the_game:
Machine Gun Mages is a game where you must venture into the realms of Hell and survive an endless horde of demons!

Diverse Hero Builds

Choose your hero's class, weapons and magical abilities that offer a variety of different gameplay experiences as you tinker and test which builds of your machine gun toting mages can survive the longest in Hell.

Actual Physics

Feel the power of your magic and the weight of your bullets as they hit and throw enemies across the hellscape

Meaningful Magic

Choose from a number of magical spells that you can upgrade and evolve into your ultimate magical ability. But be careful and choose when to exhaust your magical force at the right time to defeat your enemies and by yourself more time to survive against the endless demonic forces.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-7200U CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 940MX
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Battle through hell using your powerful magic and trusty sidearm to fight off endless demons. Pick your hero's class, grow your magical ability, customize your gear and upgrade your guns to create an incredibly replayable game experience that is new each time.
